Package neqsim.pvtsimulation.util

Enum Class BlackOilUnits

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<BlackOilUnits>
neqsim.pvtsimulation.util.BlackOilUnits
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<BlackOilUnits>, Constable
public enum BlackOilUnits extends Enum<BlackOilUnits>
Unit system enumeration for Black Oil correlations.

Supports conversion between field units (US oilfield) and SI/metric units commonly used in NeqSim.

Author:
ESOL

  • Enum Constant Details

    • FIELD

      public static final BlackOilUnits FIELD
      Field units (US oilfield standard).
      • Pressure: psia
      • Temperature: °F
      • GOR: scf/STB
      • FVF: bbl/STB or ft³/scf
      • Viscosity: cP
      • Density: lb/ft³

    • SI

      public static final BlackOilUnits SI
      SI/Metric units.
      • Pressure: bara
      • Temperature: °C
      • GOR: Sm³/Sm³
      • FVF: m³/Sm³
      • Viscosity: Pa·s (1 Pa·s = 1000 cP)
      • Density: kg/m³

    • NEQSIM

      public static final BlackOilUnits NEQSIM
      NeqSim internal units.
      • Pressure: bara
      • Temperature: K
      • GOR: Sm³/Sm³
      • FVF: m³/Sm³
      • Viscosity: Pa·s
      • Density: kg/m³

    • toCentipoise

      public static double toCentipoise(double viscosity, BlackOilUnits fromUnit)
      Convert viscosity to cP.

      Note: SI viscosity is in Pa·s (= 1000 cP), NEQSIM also uses Pa·s. FIELD uses cP.

      Parameters:
      viscosity - Viscosity value
      fromUnit - Source unit system
      Returns:
      Viscosity in cP

    • fromCentipoise

      public static double fromCentipoise(double centipoise, BlackOilUnits toUnit)
      Convert viscosity from cP.

      Note: SI viscosity is in Pa·s (= 1000 cP), NEQSIM also uses Pa·s. FIELD uses cP.

      Parameters:
      centipoise - Viscosity in cP
      toUnit - Target unit system
      Returns:
      Viscosity in target units (Pa·s for SI/NEQSIM, cP for FIELD)

    • convertBo

      public static double convertBo(double bo, BlackOilUnits fromUnit)
      Oil FVF is dimensionless (volume ratio), same in all unit systems.
      Parameters:
      bo - Oil FVF
      fromUnit - Source unit system (ignored)
      Returns:
      Oil FVF (unchanged)

    • convertBg

      public static double convertBg(double bg, BlackOilUnits fromUnit)
      Gas FVF: rcf/scf ≈ rm³/Sm³ (both are volume ratios at similar conditions).
      Parameters:
      bg - Gas FVF
      fromUnit - Source unit system (ignored for simple ratio)
      Returns:
      Gas FVF (unchanged)

    • toPerPsi

      public static double toPerPsi(double compressibility, BlackOilUnits fromUnit)
      Convert compressibility to 1/psi.
      Parameters:
      compressibility - Compressibility value
      fromUnit - Source unit system
      Returns:
      Compressibility in 1/psi
